_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:42:07 using v0.9
title: What do services users say about how satisfied they are with services?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who felt satisfied has increased from 61.7% in 2010/11 to 63.7% in 2012/13; an increase of 2.0 percentage points. However, as the data in 2010/11 are unweighted, it is more appropriate to look at the 0.9 percentage point increase from 2011/12.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
